colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,(CES DGRA LHA CHEN PO 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GTER DON SNYING PO GTER NAS 'DON TE DGE LUGS PA LA RGYUD 'DZIN SMIN SGROL CHOS KYI RGYAL PO 'DI BAR LA RGYUD PA DANG RIM BZHIN RGYUD NI YI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHAL CHER DGRA LHA GSOL KHA'I TZAM LAS GZHAN MED DO, ,'DI NI MNGON RTOGS SPYAN DRENGS BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL MNGA' GSOL TSOGS 'KHOR BZOD GSOL SHIS BRJOD DANG BCAS PA BSKANG TE 'GRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
